name: CategoryTheory.GradedObject.singleObjApplyIsoOfEq_inv_single_map
initialProofState:
J : Type u_1
C : Type u_2
inst‚úù¬≤ : CategoryTheory.Category.{u_3, u_2} C
inst‚úù¬π : CategoryTheory.Limits.HasInitial C
inst‚úù : DecidableEq J
j : J
X Y : C
f : Quiver.Hom X Y
i : J
h : Eq i j
‚ä¢ Eq (CategoryTheory.CategoryStruct.comp (CategoryTheory.GradedObject.singleObjApplyIsoOfEq j X i h).inv ((CategoryTheory.GradedObject.single j).map f i)) (CategoryTheory.CategoryStruct.comp f (CategoryTheory.GradedObject.singleObjApplyIsoOfEq j Y i h).inv)
decl:
lemma singleObjApplyIsoOfEq_inv_single_map (j : J) {X Y : C} (f : X ‚ü∂ Y) (i : J) (h : i = j) :
    (singleObjApplyIsoOfEq j X i h).inv ‚â´ (single j).map f i =
      f ‚â´ (singleObjApplyIsoOfEq j Y i h).inv := by
  subst h
  simp [singleObjApplyIsoOfEq, single]

name: CategoryTheory.GradedObject.singleCompEval_inv_app
initialProofState:
J : Type u_1
C : Type u_2
inst‚úù¬≤ : CategoryTheory.Category.{u_3, u_2} C
inst‚úù¬π : CategoryTheory.Limits.HasInitial C
inst‚úù : DecidableEq J
j : J
X : C
‚ä¢ Eq ((CategoryTheory.GradedObject.singleCompEval C j).inv.app X) (CategoryTheory.GradedObject.singleObjApplyIso j X).inv
decl:
variable (C) in
/-- The composition of the single functor `single j : C ‚•§ GradedObject J C` and the
evaluation functor `eval j` identifies to the identity functor. -/
@[simps!]
noncomputable def singleCompEval (j : J) : single j ‚ãô eval j ‚âÖ ùü≠ C :=
  NatIso.ofComponents (singleObjApplyIso j) (by simp)

evaluation functor `eval j` identifies to the identity functor. -/
